com.navis.framework.portal.query

Interface IQueryFilter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultQueryFilter

    public interface IQueryFilter
extends java.io.Serializable
    Implement this interface to define filter criteria on an Entity. A filter criteria is the ability to define a restriction clause very similar to the existing "where" attribute available on the class and various collection elements. Except these filter conditions can be parameterized. The application can then make the decision at runtime whether given filters should be enabled and what their parameter values should be. Filters can be used like database views, but parameterized inside the application.
    Author:
    Michael Mitchell
    See Also:
    DefaultQueryFilter
